content.question: In the context of the third stanza (lines 9-12), the speaker’s use of alliteration in “but a bit of blue / Above” mainly serves to

choices.label: emphasize the prominence of the mountains from the speaker’s perspective
contrast the sights and the sounds that the speaker witnesses
suggest a similarity between the speaker and the mountains
indicate the speaker’s mild frustration with the mountains

content.answer: emphasize the prominence of the mountains from the speaker’s perspective

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
